## show trend graph

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)

exercise %>%
  group_by(gender) %>%
  summarize(avg_income = sum(average_taxable_income)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = gender, y = avg_income)) + 
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
